orphaned.name: Orphaned
orphaned.description: You have never met your mother or father, never had a family. Since you were little, you've had to care for yourself. It has hardened you and made you strong, but a feeling of rootlessness gnaws within you.

herder.name: Herder
herder.description: You were taught as a child that livestock are the source of life. As an apprentice, you wandered the plains of the Forbidden Lands, guarding your herd. You spent your nights under starry skies, dreaming of adventure.

vagabond.name: Vagabond
vagabond.description: You and your family traveled from village to village, making a living doing simple jobs. You never had a real home, every day was a new adventure. You learned to live off the land, and the importance of staying together

squire.name: Squire
squire.description: You served a proud warrior. Carried her weapons and gear, took care of her horse, and learned everything you could. You dreamed of making a name for yourself in the Forbidden Lands, of one day being your own master

laborer.name: Laborer
laborer.description: You worked on a farm performing menial laborious chores. You know everything about grains, cattle, and crops. But deep inside you longed for something else.

hard studies.name: Hard Studies
hard studies.description: A learned man or woman took you under his/her wing and set you to studying the elder writings. The days were long, the learning hard, but in the end, you found that knowledge was the key to the world.

born in the saddle.name: Born In The Saddle
born in the saddle.description: You have always felt more kinship with animals than humans, and it is only on the back of your horse, with the wind whipping your face, that you feel truly free. Together you are one entity, riding across everlasting expanses in the name of the god Horn.

dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.description: You have always dreamed of gods, legends, and myhts. Ever since you were a tiny tot, you sat by the campfire listening to the clan's minstrel telling stories of the volcano god Horn, proud ancestors, and demonic invasions. It is in the dreams of your people, of heroes and legends, that you live to the fullest. Maybe one day you'll be able to create a legend of your own?

strongest of the clan.name: Strongest Of The Clan
strongest of the clan.description: Already as a child you learned that you were bigger and stronger than others. You had to work harder, be more responsible, fight the hardest. Some idolized you, others despised you.

taught by a wise women.name: Taught By A Wise Women
taught by a wise women.description: As a child you befriended a wise women of the clan. Soon you became her apprentice, and learned all about the history of your people, of ancient feats of heroism, and bloody wars.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: As a child you learned to live in tune with nature. The hunt is your task, and even if you learned to kill, you also learned to honor the value of the life of every animal.

child of the winds.name: Child Of The Winds
child of the winds.description: You were chosen as a Child of the Winds and set out on a long pilgrimage to the highlands and the mountains. All for the sake of your clan. You fulfilled your duty, but to this day you still unsure of where you feel at home.

child of the raven.name: Child Of The Raven
child of the raven.description: You grew up among the Raven Sisters, and learned to venerate the Raven god. You learned to fear the Rust Brothers, and to live off the land. It is in the wind that you feel the most free

druid's apprentice.name: Druid's Apprentice
druid's apprentice.description: You were apprenticed to a druid, and learned everything you could of the holy mysteries, of rituals and sorcery. Your master is long dead, but you still remember his/her words.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: The Ailanders were always an oppressed and hunted people. You realized this early on, and were trained to protect your people from dangers with shield and sword in hand. You were soon hardened by battle, and wear the scars to prove it.

wanderer.name: Wanderer
wanderer.description: You had no fixed place in life, the road was your home, and the Forbidden Lands was your neighborhood. Already as a child, you had seen more of the land than most.

laborer.name: Laborer
laborer.description: You worked on a farm performing menial laborious chores. You know everything about grains, cattle, and crops. But deep inside you longed for something else.

herder.name: Herder
herder.description: You were taught as a child that livestock are the source of life. As an apprentice, you wandered the plains of the Forbidden Lands, guarding your herd. You spent your nights under starry skies, dreaming of adventure.

on the run.name: On The Run
on the run.description: You have always been on the run from something. Never felt safe, and never had a lasting home. You have traveled from village to village in the Forbidden Lands, but have never been able to sleep with your back to the door.

artist.name: Artist
artist.description: Already as a child you discovered that you had a talent for artistic endeavors. It was in the arts and performance that you found peace, that was where you lived life to the fulest.

student.name: Student
student.description: You always knew that you were a little wiser than your friends. When a sage teacher took you on, you immersed yourself in the mysteries of the world. What you found in books was all that you had ever dreamed of and more.

acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.description: As a child you were agile and nimble, climbed everywhere, and discovered every nook in your neighborhood of the village. You learned the art of performance, and the importance of the beauty in the Forbidden Lands.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: You learned early on that you were talented with weapons. Soon, you were taken on by a warrior who taught you the mysteries of battle. You trained hard and long, and in time you became your master's equal.

ghost child.name: Ghost Child
ghost child.description: You grew up without a real family or home. Instead, you sought out other youths who had run away or been cast out. You were called ghost children, and lived by stealing and performing odd jobs.

baker's apprentice.name: Baker's Apprentice
baker's apprentice.description: You have always loved the scent of freshly baked bread. Since childhood, you have worked in the kitchen, baking bread that'd make anyone's mouth water.

laborer.name: Laborer
laborer.description: You worked on a farm performing menial laborious chores. You know everything about grains, cattle, and crops. But deep inside you longed for something else.

craftsman.name: Craftsman
craftsman.description: You were always skilled with your fingers, and learned to master a craft early on. You expressed yourself through the objects you created. But they also made you long to see the works of the real masters.

raised in the kitchen.name: Raised In The Kitchen
raised in the kitchen.description: You spent almost all of your childhood in the kitchen. Among the scents of soups, stews, and brews. Your learned the secrets of spices and the joy of a well-cooked meal.

bookworm.name: Bookworm
bookworm.description: When other children played in the forest, you preffered to bury your nose in an old book, reading of myths, dragons, and treasures.

loner.name: Loner
loner.description: You have never felt at home among your people, always keeping to yourself. You grew up in the shadow of your comrades. You saw things they didn´t see, did things they never imagined.

wolfling.name: Wolfling
wolfling.description: Your parents abandoned you when you were a child, but you found a new home with a wolf pack. You became one of the wolves, howled at the moon, loped across the plains, and ate raw flesh.

scrounger.name: Scrounger
scrounger.description: You learned as a child that the ownership of objects is nothing but a fleeting thought. You have always had a talent for acquiring things that aren't yours. It's like they just... appear.

child of the woods.name: Child Of The Woods
child of the woods.description: You grew up under the cover of the forest. You climbed the trees, and felt the wind whisper among the leaves. It is in the forest that you feel safe, and you know that its creatures will always protect you.

wildling.name: Wildling
wildling.description: Your clan was a bunch of mavericks who didn't care for old lineages and pacts. You grew up wild and free, no one has ever been able to tell you what to do.

wanderer.name: Wanderer
wanderer.description: You had no fixed place in life, the road was your home, and the Forbidden Lands was your neighborhood. Already as a child, you had seen more of the land than most.

storyteller.name: Storyteller
storyteller.description: As a wee goblin, you sat by the fire, eyes like saucers, and listened to the legends of your people being told by the clan elder. In your mind, you traveled through time and space, and relived the fantastic stories. You made sure that you learned all you could from the old goblin, and it didn't take long before you became one of the clan's storytellers.

minstrel.name: Minstrel
minstrel.description: It was in the stories of the suffering of your people that you found your true self. In your youth, you learned the songs of the betrayal of the elves, and the blood spilt in the wars. You will never forget.

worker.name: Worker
worker.description: Life was hard, even as a young orc. You have toiled for as long as you can remember. Worked hard to be able to live your life as you please.

brigand.name: Brigand
brigand.description: A strong orc is an orc that can care for himself. You realized early on that you must steal to survive. And why not? The orcs have been betrayed time and time again.

drifter.name: Drifter
drifter.description: You grew up on the road, in the forest, and on the plains. You have never been able to settle in one place. Your restless legs won't let you.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: You grew up on the battlefield. Had already slain your first enemy as a young orc. It was with weapon in hand that you felt respected for the first time.

loner.name: Loner
loner.description: You have never felt at home among your people, always keeping to yourself. You grew up in the shadow of your comrades. You saw things they didn´t see, did things they never imagined.

howler.name: Howler
howler.description: You grew up among the howlers, wolfkin that moved between the clans, their own masters, free. You were trained in the telling of the tragic legends that have been told by generations of howlers before you.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Already as a young pup you learned that blood is life. The older hunters in the clan taught you to respect the animals, even as you kill them. The hunt is the basis of life.

outcast.name: Outcast
outcast.description: When the other cubs ran with the pack, you were cast out. Alone, you learned to live off the forest, and that other kin could be more kind than your own. One day, you will find your way home.

tracker.name: Tracker
tracker.description: You learned early on that your sense of smell was better than your comrades, and you soon realized that you could find the most amazing things if you just followed your snout.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: You were the strongest in your litter, and completely dominated your siblings' games. As you grew bigger, the elders in the clan saw that you were a natural fighter, and trained you in the secrets of battle.

child of the forest.name: Child Of The Forest
child of the forest.description: Ever since you were a child, you've been drawn to the fruits of the forests, to flowers, herbs, and lakes. You learned everything you could from the clan's herbalist, the scent of every flower, and which plants nurtured life - or ended it.

smith's apprentice.name: Smith's Apprentice
smith's apprentice.description: It has always in the sweltering heat of the forge that you felt most at home. You learned the mystery of steel during many long days in the glow of the fire.

mineborn.name: Mineborn
mineborn.description: Already as a child, you learned to navigate in the darkness, deep below the eart. It was in the presence of the rock and the cold that you felt most at home.

scout's apprentice.name: Scout's Apprentice
scout's apprentice.description: You were always perceptive, always curious. It soon came to the attention of your clan members, and you were handpicked to learn the duties of a scout. Many long days where spent hiding, watching the dangers of the Forbidden Lands.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: You were chosen to be a guardian-in-training, serving as something similar to a squire to a proud and powerful dwarven warrior. It was arduous work, but also educational. Your master taught you to handle weapons, to temper your courage, and to stand proud - no matter the dangers you face.

carver.name: Carver
carver.description: Dwarves have always burrowed inwards and downwards. Created life out of rock. As a child you were fascinated by the art of shaping the mountain after your image. You became a carver, an engineer and builder, who worked as much with the mind as with brute strength.

hard studies.name: Hard Studies
hard studies.description: A learned man or woman took you under his/her wing and set you to studying the elder writings. The days were long, the learning hard, but in the end, you found that knowledge was the key to the world.

loner.name: Loner
loner.description: You have never felt at home among your people, always keeping to yourself. You grew up in the shadow of your comrades. You saw things they didn´t see, did things they never imagined.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: You learned early on that you were talented with weapons. Soon, you were taken on by a warrior who taught you the mysteries of battle. You trained hard and long, and in time you became your master's equal.

child of the forest.name: Child Of The Forest
child of the forest.description: Ever since you were a child, you've been drawn to the fruits of the forests, to flowers, herbs, and lakes. You learned everything you could from the clan's herbalist, the scent of every flower, and which plants nurtured life - or ended it.

hard studies.name: Hard Studies
hard studies.description: A learned man or woman took you under his/her wing and set you to studying the elder writings. The days were long, the learning hard, but in the end, you found that knowledge was the key to the world.

wanderer.name: Wanderer
wanderer.description: You had no fixed place in life, the road was your home, and the Forbidden Lands was your neighborhood. Already as a child, you had seen more of the land than most.

druid's apprentice.name: Druid's Apprentice
druid's apprentice.description: You were apprenticed to a druid, and learned everything you could of the holy mysteries, of rituals and sorcery. Your master is long dead, but you still remember his/her words.

pilgrimage.name: Pilgrimage
pilgrimage.description: You performed a pilgrimage that lead you across the Forbidden Lands. You reached your destination after many hardships, but you will never forget your perilous journey.
pilgrimage.items: ✣ Receive a staff, a backpack, and a waterskin.

hunted.name: Hunted
hunted.description: Something happened that forced you to run for your life. Maybe you rubbed the wrong person the wrong way, maybe you were accused of something you hadn't done.
hunted.items: ✣ Receive D3 doses sleeping poison and a dagger.

unexpected find.name: Unexpected Find
unexpected find.description: You found a treasure marked with the sign of your god. You saw this as a sign that your mission was righteous, but others didn't see it the same way. Maybe there is still someone looking for the treasure?
unexpected find.items: ✣ Roll once on the table for Valuable finds in the lair, reroll if the result is below 32.

studied with a master.name: Studied With A Master
studied with a master.description: A wise druid took you under his/her wing and taught you for a long period. It was an intense time, but also educational. Maybe your master is still alive somewhere, maybe he/she was killed by the Iron Guard.

protected the forest.name: Protected The Forest
protected the forest.description: You took it upon yourself to protect a forest against the evil and violence of strangers. You lived in the cover of proud trees, one with the beings of the forest.
protected the forest.items: ✣ Receive a short bow and a D12 Resource Die for arrows.

lived as a hermit.name: Lived As A Hermit
lived as a hermit.description: You sought the beauty of nature, away from the violent conflicts of the Forbidden Lands. When you finally returned to the land, you did so with newfound strength.
lived as a hermit.items: ✣ Receive a tent and a field kitchen.

captured.name: Captured
captured.description: You were shamefully captured by enemies. You were thrown in a dungeon to be forgotten and die. When the opportunity arose to escape, you took it.

bloody battle.name: Bloody Battle
bloody battle.description: You took part in a terrible battle and were badly injured. When dawn broke, your friends had been defeated to the last man, and the enemy had left you to the ravens.

a long march.name: A Long March
a long march.description: You signed on as a soldier and marched across the Forbidden Lands. You barely remember what you fought for, or who your enemies were. But you remember how the forces of nature took your friends one by one.
a long march.items: ✣ Receive a tent, a blanket, and a cauldron.

on horseback.name: On Horseback
on horseback.description: You learned to ride and signed on as a knight with a lord. You fought in skirmishes, patrolled and guarded the country from enemies.
on horseback.items: ✣ Receive a mount of your choice (not warhorse)

scout.name: Scout
scout.description: You signed on with a company of soldiers and were placed in the vanguard as a scout. Your task to discover the enemy before they discovered you, and you were good at it. Maybe something happened to your squad, maybe you weren't paying much attention just that once?
scout.items: ✣ Receive a light crossbow and a D12 Resource Die for arrows.

commander.name: Commander
commander.description: You commanded a squad of soldiers. Your comrades looked up to you and would die for you. But something happened, maybe you were betrayed, maybe defeated in an ambush. Your comrades fell or fled, but you survived.
commander.items: ✣ Receive chainmail armor and a closed helmet.

hunted a beast.name: Hunted A Beast
hunted a beast.description: The hunt was everything. You tracked the beast over land, water, and mountain. At times, the roles were reversed, maybe at times you were the prey?
hunted a beast.items: ✣ Receive a short spear and a bear trap.

lived off the forest.name: Lived Off The Forest
lived off the forest.description: You dwelt in the forest and lived off it. During the days you hunted, and at night, you slept under the open sky. It was a simple but good life. It had to end one day.
lived off the forest.items: ✣ Receive a throwing spear and a dagger.

tamed a mount.name: Tamed A Mount
tamed a mount.description: You caught a wild horse (or another suitable animal). It wasn't easy, but after a long time you tamed the creature and in time you became inseparable.
tamed a mount.items: ✣ Receive a mount of your choice. It cannot be a warhorse.

won an archery competition.name: Won An Archery Competition
won an archery competition.description: You realized early on that you had a natural talent for archery, and set out to become even better. When you visited a large village or castle, you participated in a competition and won.
won an archery competition.items: ✣ Receive a longbow and a D12 Resource Die for arrows.

guide.name: Guide
guide.description: You loaned your talents as a guide to those who paid the best. You led caravans of peddlers, troops of soldiers, and curious adventurers. You learned the art of traversing the Forbidden Lands and living off of it.
guide.items: ✣ Receive a tent, a cauldron, and a blanket.

hunted for a lord.name: Hunted For A Lord
hunted for a lord.description: A nobleman noticed your skills and hired you as his forester. You lived a good life, half of the time in comfort in the lord's castle, the rest of the time hunting in the woods.
hunted for a lord.items: ✣ Receive a well-sewn cloak and a sleeping fur.

wrote a popular ballad.name: Wrote A Popular Ballad
wrote a popular ballad.description: A ballad or story that you wrote became immensely popular in the surrounding area. To this day, you hear local minstrels performing your piece.
wrote a popular ballad.items: ✣ Receive ink, a feather, and parchment.

worked as a minstrel.name: Worked As A Minstrel
worked as a minstrel.description: You used your artistic talents to make a living as a minstre. Maybe you were of the traveling kind, maybe you worked at a more permanent location, like a tavern or a castle.

inspirational journey.name: Inspirational Journey
inspirational journey.description: You went on a journey across the Forbidden Lands, to learn of the kin, cultures, and legends. On your journey you encountered many adventures and gathered enough material to fill a smaller book of ballads.
inspirational journey.items: ✣ Receive a small tent, a blanket, and a cauldron.

sang for a lord.name: Sang For A Lord
sang for a lord.description: Your talent drew the attention of a local lord and he offered you a place as an entertainer at his court. Your time in the castle was filled with wine, delicious food, and clinking silver. But also insidious intrigue, assassinations, and jealousy.
sang for a lord.items: ✣ Receive fine garments and a dagger

enlisted.name: Enlisted
enlisted.description: Life took an unexpected turn and you were enlisted in a company of soldiers. Life in the field was rough, but you made faithful friends and learned to live off the land.
enlisted.items: ✣ Receive leather armor and an open helmet.

dueled a rival.name: Dueled A Rival
dueled a rival.description: A rival saw you as a thorn in his side. For a period, your fates were interwined in the most troublesome ways: love, money, and work. In the end, it was too much. You were challenged to a duel, and you were injured. Maybe your rival is still out somewhere.

caravan.name: Caravan
caravan.description: You were part of an arduous trade caravan that traveled through the Forbidden Lands. The caravan encountered many dangers, and not everyone made it to the final destination. Maybe someone was left behind on the way?

local business.name: Local Business
local business.description: You saw a financial opportunity and you made the most of it. Maybe you imported fruit to a lord's castle, maybe you sold fabrics from Alderland. Business went swimmingly - for a while.

cheated.name: Cheated
cheated.description: A trusted companion deceived you and left you destitute. You learned and important lesson the hard way, and had to spend a long time rebuilding your life from the rubble. Maybe your old companion still alive?
cheated.items: ✣ Receive a small tent, a blanket and a cauldron.

side mission.name: Side Mission
side mission.description: You teamed up with a group of adventurers and went on a great adventure in the Forbidden Lands. You had to face many dangers, and many perished on the journey, but you learned a lot about yourself on the way.
side mission.items: ✣ Receive a chainmail armor and a small shield.

smuggler.name: Smuggler
smuggler.description: You created a lucrative business by smuggling contraband between the settlements of the Forbidden Lands. Maybe you smuggled weapons, maybe forbidden drugs. You learned the importance of discretion and how to avoid attention.

ran a shop.name: Ran A Shop
ran a shop.description: You chose to settle in a village and run a shop for a period of your life. You could live off of it, but not very well. In the end, you realized that the quiet existance wasn't for you.
ran a shop.items: ✣ Receive a scale, ink, a quill, and parchment.

enlisted.name: Enlisted
enlisted.description: You joined a company of soldiers. Maybe you joined of your own free will, maybe you were conscripted. With your comrades you braved many hardships: battles, long marches, and harsh weather. In the end, something happened to make you leave the company.
enlisted.items: ✣ Receive studded leather armor and a large shield.

competed.name: Competed
competed.description: You earned a living as a competitive rider, and traveled from village to village, castle to castle and competed against other riders. As long as you were winning you had a good life, but when you started losing, it was time to move on.

traveled the land.name: Traveled The Land
traveled the land.description: Your lust for adventure took over, and you went out for a long ride across the Forbidden Lands. You rode through miserable wastes, severe storms, and braves many dangers.
traveled the land.items: ✣ Receive a small tent, a cauldron, and a blanket.

caravan guard.name: Caravan Guard
caravan guard.description: You took employment as a guard in a caravan, and escorted peddlers through dark forests and high mountains.

cattle herder.name: Cattle Herder
cattle herder.description: You herded livestock to greener pastures in the Forbidden Lands. In the daytime, you guarded the herd from horseback. At night, you slept under the open sky.
cattle herder.items: ✣ Receive a lantern and a waterskin.

steppe rider.name: Steppe Rider
steppe rider.description: You rode across the everlasting steppes of the Forbidden Lands and lived simply by hunting and selling meat and animals hides.
steppe rider.items: ✣ Receive a short bow and a D12 Resource Die for arrows

stole from the wrong person.name: Stole From The Wrong Person
stole from the wrong person.description: It was the perfect crime. For a while. You stole something valuable from the wrong person, at the wrong time. You were hunted and had to run for your life.

imprisoned.name: Imprisoned
imprisoned.description: Guilty or not, you were caught and thrown in jail. You had to spend a long time in the darkness but never gave up. Finally, the chance to escape emerged, and you took it.

successful heist.name: Successful Heist
successful heist.description: You planned and successfully performed a heist. Maybe it was against a rich peddler, maybe against a local lord.
successful heist.items: ✣ Receive an item from Valuable finds in a lair. Reroll if the result is below 33.

joined a guild of thieves.name: Joined A Guild Of Thieves
joined a guild of thieves.description: You sought out an association of thieves and became part of the community. Together, you planned heists, and carried out dangerous missions.

enlisted.name: Enlisted
enlisted.description: You found yourself, probably against your will, enlisted in a company of soldiers. There you worked as a scout, and ranged far ahead of the others. Your time there was filled with misery and dangers, but also friendship.
enlisted.items: ✣ Receive a short bow and a D12 Resource Die for arrows.

band of robbers.name: Band Of Robbers
band of robbers.description: You disappeared into the woods and joined a band of robbers that lived off peddlers and caravans who stumbled into their path. Life in the forest was carefree and good for as long as it lasted, but in the end, the robbers were ousted from the woods.

failed experiment.name: Failed Experiment
failed experiment.description: You performed a magical experiment that failed catastrophically. Maybe someone was seriously injured, maybe you were banished from your home.
failed experiment.items: ✣ Receive a D6 doses of hallucinogenic poison.

secluded studies.name: Secluded Studies
secluded studies.description: You sought out a secluded location to immerse yourself in the study of magic. You lived off nature and your books and scrolls were your only companions.
secluded studies.items: ✣ Receive a small tent and a cauldron.

found strange artifact.name: Found Strange Artifact
found strange artifact.description: You found a strange artifact during your travels through the Forbidden Lands. You became obsessed with its history and the thought that it might hold magical powers.
found strange artifact.items: ✣ Roll once on the table for Valuable finds in the lair. Re-roll if the result is below 32.

court magician.name: Court Magician
court magician.description: You took employment with a local lord and served as his arcane advisor. Maybe the lord had a hidden agenda, maybe you got into a conflict with higher ranking advisors. You learned much about people in positions of power.
court magician.items: ✣ Receive a bottle of expensive wine and a cloak.

entertainer.name: Entertainer
entertainer.description: You worked as an entertainer, using your knowledge of magic to perform illusioins and tricks. Maybe you worked at a run down inn, maybe you were employed at a lord's court.
entertainer.items: ✣ Receive fine garments and a crystal ball.

enlisted.name: Enlisted
enlisted.description: You were enlisted in a company of soldiers. You spent a long time in the field where you assisted with your magical expertise. You saw comrades killed, but you managed to make it out with just an ugly scar or two.
enlisted.items: ✣ Receive studded leather armor and a closed helmet.
